level4.node1: The percentage of product readily available for purchase on shelves
level4.node2: Total duration of shelves exceeding empty threshold / Total operating hour of shelves
level4.node3: Number of times of on-time shelf replenishment / Number of alerts
level4.node4: Number of customers searching for product on shelves during period when empty ratio exceed alert threshold

level4.node1: Measures the total time taken to serve a customer in store, including waiting time, processing time and consultation time
level4.node2: Number of customers being served / Number of customers entering the waiting area
level4.node3: Customer feelings about in-store shopping experience
level4.node4: Percentage of customers leaving the waiting area before being served

level4.node1: #customers who stop to view a specific poster (for at least 5s)
level4.node2: #customers who view a specific content in a specific poster (for at least 5s)
level4.node4: Average viewing time customer spent for a poster
level4.node5: Average viewing time customer spent for a specific content in a specific poster
